data.title: Form 9205: Labor Peace Agreement Notarized Statement
data.excerpt: An applicant for a commercial cannabis business that has not already entered into a labor peace agreement may use this form to complete the notarized statement required by Business and Professions Code section 26051.5 and Department regulations sections 15002(c)(19) and 15023(b). This statement must be signed by an owner who is identified and disclosed on the license application.
